PropertyList.text:
=== LOAD LIMITS =========================================== - Max. load: 8 g - Destructive load: 12 g
=== MAX.SPEED, CLEAN ====================================== ... 900 m: IAS = 1070 km/h 900 m...5000 m: M = 0.92 5000 m...7500 m: M = 0.96 7500 m... : M = 1.00
=== MAX.SPEED, WITH DROP TANKS ============================ ...3500 m: IAS = 700 km/h 3500 m... : M = 0.7
=== GEAR / FLAP SPEEDS ==================================== Gear extended: 400 km/h Flaps 20deg: 500 km/h Flaps 55deg: 380 km/h Touchdown: 250 km/h
=== BEST CLIMB SPEED ====================================== v_true = 710 km/h (11560 rpm)
=== MINIMUM MANEUVERING SPEED ============================= v_ind = 300 km/h
BE CAREFUL to stay above 300km/h during approach until the correct glidepath is established. The design landing weight is 4010 kg. When landing at a higher weight, increase speed.
=== ENGINE LIMITS ========================================= - Max.power ( 5min): 11560 rpm - Nominal (60min): 11200 rpm - Cruise : 10870 rpm - Max temperature : 825 degC
The engine will flame out if you keep throttle to idle; increase throttle to 7000 rpm to taxi.
=== DROP TANKS INDICATOR LIGHT ============================ On the lower center panel (between the pilot's knees) there is an indicator light to the left and a switch to the right. Turn on the switch to activate the indicator light. The lamp will light up if the drop tanks are empty *OR* if the engine speed is lower than 6500 RPM. This means: In order to check if the tanks are empty it is neccessary to accelerate the engine to at least 6500 RPM.
=== TAKEOFF =============================================== - Flaps 20deg - Push stick forward during acceleration - At 195km/h gently lift front wheel - Rotate only 5deg and let aircraft lift off by itself - Unstick speed 223km/h (with external tanks 235km/h) - Retract gear and flaps immediately after liftoff - Accelerate to 400km/h
=== LANDING =============================================== - Throttle to minimum - Extend speed brakes - Slow down to 450 km/h - Extend gear - Flaps 20 deg - Slow down to 350 km/h - Flaps 55 deg - Increase throttle to maintain 300 km/h - Align with runway - Release throttle holder (Shift+R) - Final approach 250 km/h (4010 kg) - Throttle to idle above runway threshold - Flare at 225 km/h - Touch down at 172 km/h (4010 kg) - Apply brakes
